headline: Zimmer Biomet Announces Quarterly Dividend for First Quarter of 2026
summary: Zimmer Biomet Holdings, Inc. (NYSE and SIX: ZBH), a global medical technology leader, today announced that its Board of Directors has approved the payment of a quarterly cash dividend to stockholders for the first quarter of 2026. The cash dividend of $0.24 per share is payable on or about April 30, 2026 to stockholders of record as of the close of business on March 31, 2026.
